locate_end_stronghold.title: Find a Stronghold
locate_end_stronghold.description: Strongholds are hidden underground and you can use Eyes tolocate it. The eyes are shattered across the Overworld

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Let`s hope you gathered enough eyes to open the portal.

travel_to_the_end.title: Travel to The End
travel_to_the_end.description: Place the eyes into the portal frame and jump inside of it.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome to the high sky! Make sure not to tip over the edges of these islands as there is just abyss downwards.

defeat_ender_dragon.title: Defeat The Ender Dragon
defeat_ender_dragon.description: She is not any dragon. She is a mysic and strong dragon that helds healing power from end crystals placed on pillars

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: What a fight! The End is still very vast and the dragon, tho the biggest not it`s final threat.

locate_end_tower.title: Find an End Tower
locate_end_tower.description: End Towers are Outer End pillars with glass on top that contain rare loot.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing. Let`s clear the place so we can properly loot.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great job! Now it`s time to loot what these chests have to offer

locate_end_catacombs.title: Find The End Catacombs
locate_end_catacombs.description: The End Catacombs are bunkers with exit on the surface of islands that contain very rare loot!

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Amazing. Let`s clear the place so we can properly loot.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great job! Now it`s time to loot what these chests have to offer

locate_end_city.title: Find an End City
locate_end_city.description: End Cities are vast or minuscule treeformed towers from the end islands with the rarest loot possible in The End.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: What a structure! Let`s hope for an Elytra!

get_dragon_head.title: Get a Dragon Head
get_dragon_head.description: Dragon heads can be found End Villages or End Ships. Very much needed for Library of Alexandria

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Just think about the recipes we could fill with this.

get_draconic_backpack.title: Get a Draconic Backpack
get_draconic_backpack.description: Craft a Draconic Backpack to carry even more items with you roadming the world.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! This is the best Backpack of the world. Did you knew you can upgrade your backpack to have workbenches?

75combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 75
75combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 75.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

get_tier_7_power_up.title: Get Yourself a Stronger Powerup 7
get_tier_7_power_up.description: Powerups are armor trim materials that enhance your gear with various stats. Type /powerups to find out more about it

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Great! Apply those to your armor to become stronger!

locate_obsidilith_arena.title: Find the Obsidilith Arena
locate_obsidilith_arena.description: The Obsidilith Arena is the pillar that holds the Obsidilith, an obsidian made creature that holds mystical items near by.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Perfect! Now time to face the evil. Did you brought a pickaxe? Tho i think we need an Ender Eye..

defeat_obsidilith.title: Defeat The Obsidilith
defeat_obsidilith.description: It`s behavior is unknown. So take care when fightining it.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Impressive results. Now grow stronger as we have new realms to free.

80combatlvl.title: Reach Combat Lvl 80
80combatlvl.description: Fight enemies to raise your combat level to at least 80.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Your combat skills are improving. Keep it up!

travel_end_to_overworld.title: Travel back to the Overworld
travel_end_to_overworld.description: Get back home as we need to find the next adventure.

dialogue.speaker: Elder Librarian
dialogue.message: Welcome back home, but adventure continues. The following dimension we shall visit is The Nether
